programme.title: The Recruit
Kill Bill
Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc:
The Recruit: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan, Gabriel Macht. A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0292506/","name":"The Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MDMzOTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTE0NTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0292506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"UACW"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ambiguous?","reviewBody":"Ironic this movie's made by Spyglass? Or is it? Isn't there ambiguity there as well?

Nothing is what it seems.

Yes the writers could have gone over their screenplay and given it another one-two and that may have raised the caliber another notch, but this is still good entertainment. It won't change your life, but it will be a well spent couple of hours.

And it's true the movie could in theory have had a more sophisticated (ambiguous) ending, but there comes a time, after wading through all the trollop on the market, that one just sinks back and decides to enjoy a better movie for all it's worth.

And this is such a movie: directed by the capable Roger Donaldson who directed the taut thriller No Way Out and co-authored by a writer on The Natural, this one keeps going at a brisk pace with excellent editing and super soundtrack from Klaus Badelt of POTC1 fame. Farrell - who actually comes off smaller than life what with all the tripe written about him, and that's not a bad thing - and former fashion model Moynahan make the sparks fly. You feel for the protagonists and that's an essential ingredient of any good movie.

But Pacino: he's great at whatever he does but is he fated to have secondary roles now? Bah.

There's a bit of a 'Spy Game' feel to things but there's no shameless copying going on. There just aren't many movies in this genre. And Spy Game doesn't have the thrill and suspense this one has. Yes, you might eventually figure everything out before the denouement, but you won't be upset. And odds are you won't figure everything out anyway - some yes; all of it - no.

As for that ending: some people would perhaps prefer more ambiguity. On several planes. Others would say the ending is ambiguous enough. At least on one plane, perhaps several.

Nothing is what it seems."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132914,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-04-30","keywords":"recruit,training,watching tv,jefferson memorial,smithsonian institute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Recruit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi499253529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870013/","name":"Roger Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322248/","name":"Mitch Glazer"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Konfrontacja
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Nowi mieszkańcy
Nachmieter
programme.desc: Rok 1945. Niemcy opuszczają Wrocław. Jedna z mieszkających pod miastem rodzin zmuszona jest zostać kilka miesięcy dłużej, niż zakładała. W jej domu zjawia się już jednak polska grupa krewnych. Obydwa klany mają poczucie krzywdy i wzajemnie są do siebie uprzedzone.

programme.title: Hi, How Are You
programme.desc: Bezrobotny pięćdziesięcioletni Sławek (Jacek Poniedziałek) ma problem z zabiciem wolnego czasu. Mężczyzna przesiaduje w domu bądź włóczy się po osiedlu, szukając zaginionego kota. W najlepszym razie wykonuje różnego rodzaju prace zlecone mu przez żonę. Pewnego dnia Sławek poznaje tajemniczą sąsiadkę Kamilę (Maja Szopa). Kobieta zaprasza go do swojego ogrodu.

credits.actor: Jacek Poniedziałek

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: Babyteeth
Zaraza
Ill: Final Contagium
programme.desc:
Babyteeth: Directed by Shannon Murphy. With Eliza Scanlen, Michelle Lotters, Toby Wallace, Sora Wakaki. Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

Grade: B+","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14022,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"MA-17","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2020-07-23","keywords":"pills,dog,teenage girl loses her hair,teenage girl wears a wig,hospital","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Babyteeth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi678936601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM2ODA5ZDItMjJjMS00ZTYxLTk3ODItOTNiMGEwZGQ2NzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7340546/","name":"Eliza Scanlen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9334013/","name":"Michelle Lotters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3108675/","name":"Toby Wallace"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2221724/","name":"Shannon Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234956/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0658237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017733/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1514808/","name":"Rita Kalnejais"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8399664/","name":"Babyteeth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRhMzRkYzEtMDBjNy00YjkxLWJjNzctNzEwNGNhZDUyZWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8399664/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad","dateCreated":"2020-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well Acted But Very Depressing","reviewBody":"Well acted but very depressing.

Eliza Scanlan gives a fascinating performance as a young woman who's going through cancer treatment and falls for a drug addict who may or may not be good for her. Her parents (Essie Davis and Ben Mendelsohn) are dysfunctional and unraveling and have drug problems of their own. They don't like her daughter's boyfriend and under normal circumstances probably wouldn't tolerate him. But he's the only thing that brings their daughter some respite from the hell she's going through, so they sort of adopt him as their own.

"Babyteeth" is a coming of age movie that's set apart from others like it because of the protagonist's existential crisis. Scanlan's character is as immature in some ways as any sixteen year old, but at the same time is being asked to summon up reserves of maturity to deal with the ultimate curve ball life has to throw at us. How do you balance the emotional and hormonal ups and downs of teen romance with the possibility of your impending death?

The film is a bit monotonous in tone and starts to feel like a grind after a while. But again, it's worth seeing for the performances and for the unsentimental treatment of the subject matter that would have possibly segued into the maudlin in different hands. The ending scene is the most devastating thing I've seen in a movie this year.

programme.title: Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent
Vivien Leigh. Przeminęła z wiatrem
Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent
programme.desc:
Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent: Directed by Priscilla Pizzato. With Mathieu Buscatto, Vivien Leigh, Elsa Lepoivre, Laurence Olivier. Revealed by "Gone with the Wind", Vivien Leigh entered the pantheon of the seventh art at the age of 24 as Scarlett O'Hara, the most coveted role of the time. The young actress won the Oscar for best actress in 1940. Surfing on her notoriety, Vivien Leigh went on to make five feature films before being crowned a second time in 1952 for her moving incarnation of Blanche Dubois in "A Tramway Named Desire". During the shooting, the actress was prone to crises before being diagnosed bipolar. Interned in England, she will receive electroshock therapy for many years. This documentary draws a moving portrait of the tormented woman behind the icon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt13779498/","name":"Vivien Leigh, autant en emporte le vent","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJlNTlkYmQtOWQxOC00MmZiLWI5NGYtOTBiMTU2MDVjNTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIwNjIxNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revealed by "Gone with the Wind", Vivien Leigh entered the pantheon of the seventh art at the age of 24 as Scarlett O'Hara, the most coveted role of the time. The young actress won the Oscar for best actress in 1940. Surfing on her n","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13779498/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ulicknormanowen"},"dateCreated":"2021-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A legend the wind will never blow away.....","reviewBody":"A good biopic about one of the greatest British actresses of all time; although too short, it spans all her career ,handicapped by bipolar disorders , bouts of tuberculosis ...and certainly her beauty ,people having a tendency to believe that a gorgeous lady cannot be considered a serious character actress.

But what a career ! Much time (not too much) is given over to "gone with the wind": most amazing thing ,she wrote Laurence Olivier she was certain the epic would be a flop !But other movies are evoked : " a streetcar named desire" , her second AA , showed a woman who did not think twice when it came to making yourself ugly ; as Kazan told many times ,they only got on together after some time because she was influenced by what she did with her husband in London (and London is far from the world of Tennessee Williams ) ; it includes extracts from "fire over England" ,her first film with Olivier, the superb melodrama "Waterloo bridge" ,and the film in which she had the guts to play her own role of aging actress "the Roman spring of Mrs Stone "based on a novel by her friend Tennessee Williams. The doomed effort " Elephants walk" (later replaced by Elizabeth Taylor)is also mentioned .

She always insisted that she would be free to play on stage and on screen ,that's why her filmography is rather small .

Much time is given over to her legendary love affair with Laurence Olivier (they were both married with children when they met); Leigh suffered from scathing critics by Kenneth Tynan who wrote that she spoiled her husband's playing .He was to revise his opinion later.

After her divorce , actor Jack Merivale took good care of her (he knew of her health problems) The biopic ends with pictures of her last movie which featured French actress Simone Signoret who showed sympathy for her during the shooting.

A legend.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Documentary","Biography"],"datePublished":"2020-01-03","keywords":"vivien leigh,bipolar disorder","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123933/","name":"Mathieu Buscatto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000046/","name":"Vivien Leigh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0503333/","name":"Elsa Lepoivre"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4891785/","name":"Priscilla Pizzato"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079103/"}],"duration":"PT52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sole
Sole
programme.desc: Sole: Directed by Carlo Sironi. With Claudio Segaluscio, Sandra Drzymalska, Bruno Buzzi, Marco Felli. Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. Ermanno agrees to pretend to be the father. Fabio, the uncle of Ermanno, will pay them to buy the child that he and his wife Bianca cannot have. A fake adoption between relatives, a loophole to bypass the law cause in Italy the surrogate motherhood is forbidden. A world in which money is the only standard of value, the only thing that matter. Ermanno and Lena are two strangers that must pretend in public to be a couple and live together until the delivery. They are used to only think about themselves and they fight all the time. But living side by side they start becoming what they were only pretending to be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9648994/","name":"Sole","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjI2YjUtMzAyOS00YWViLWJiY2UtYzcwZTliYjk5YTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzMxMDgxNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. programme.desc: Secretary: Directed by Steven Shainberg. With James Spader, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jeremy Davies, Lesley Ann Warren. A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0274812/","name":"Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmY1MTdiMDUtYzU4Ny00NWY0LTk2YjctMWU3ZTUxZjg1OTE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0274812/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lasciare"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"oh, james, oh, maggie...","reviewBody":"How refreshing!! It has been quite some time since I went to the movies and walked out feeling I could wholeheartedly endorse the film I just saw. When asked why this film was so good by my coworkers, I responded "the actors' performances, the sets, the script, the content, essentially everything." And so it is, everything. Thank the spirits that flow someone still has the ability, honesty, and energy to make such a film in the land of fakery and deception. While the relationship depicted is that of a sadist and a masochist and this is what will get played up in the press, the point is the relationship and the near impossibility of love working without complete honesty. Bravo.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":88516,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-10-11","keywords":"secretary,bdsm,submissive woman,pantyhose,sexual role playing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Secretary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2232746777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFmNzcxMTUtMTRmNy00MTg0LTk5NjItMjNjMjM5MGU2NTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpoYW5uYXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFmNzcxMTUtMTRmNy00MTg0LTk5NjItMjNjMjM5MGU2NTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpoYW5uYXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Lionsgate"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000652/","name":"James Spader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350454/","name":"Maggie Gyllenhaal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001111/","name":"Jeremy Davies"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0787601/","name":"Steven Shainberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080007/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033548/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114931/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933379/","name":"Erin Cressida Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1122344/","name":"Mary Gaitskill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0787601/","name":"Steven Shainberg"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La virgen de los sicarios
Matka boska morderców
La Virgen de los sicarios
programme.desc: La virgen de los sicarios: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Germán Jaramillo, Anderson Ballesteros, Juan David Restrepo, Manuel Busquets. The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexis himself is fatally gunned down, grief-stricken Fernando hunts for his young lover's killer in the Medellin slums, but instead encounters Wilmar, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Alexis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250809/","name":"La virgen de los sicarios","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgyZGY1OGYtOTRlMy00OWJhLThjYTItZTcxOTdmMDhiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250809/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eroka"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A realistic and subversive film","reviewBody":"I saw the film at the Jerusalem Film Festival. It was a rather late screening, but the viewers were glued to their seats. It's a very gripping movie and extremely subversive in themes, language and visuals. It's very anti current-day Colombia, and no wonder the production didn't go very smoothly. Still I admire the support the film got from `official' institutions in Medellion. It's subversive in themes, because we basically have a gay couple, an older man (about 40-50) who indulges in having sex with minor boys (who do this willingly, and yet, it's rather shocking to the average viewer) in return for financial support, or rather indulging the boys in whatever they want to do. The couple goes around the city and is critical of every facet of the city  and rightly so  yet the tone is overtly cynical and `evil'. The lead boy, Alexis, goes around and kills whomever is threatening him and his sugar-daddy  I think he executed 4 people once a confrontation was about to happen, and 4 more were other kids who were after him. S this shooting spree is depicted in a somewhat accepting manner, as if this is the way to do these things in Colombia. They ridicule almost every aspect of life  church, police, government, the drug lords, poor and beggars, the bourgeoisie, other gays, and even themselves. In that respect, it's a very Pasolini movie, although the realism here is a real one and not made for the sake of a socialist agenda. The writer and his two boy-lovers are very lost, although they always know where they are, and the ending is pretty bad, as expected. The film shows no hope for the Colombian people, as they are stuck in a country ran by corrupt officials, gangs and drug lords. The writer has great lines, one of my favorite was about him hating people who whistle, because they shouldn't try and imitate the art that was given to the birds A good movie, with a 7/10 as far as I can say. IMDb data; ttnr: 0250809, Title: La virgen de los sicarios, --- Description: La virgen de los sicarios: Directed by Barbet Schroeder. With Germán Jaramillo, Anderson Ballesteros, Juan David Restrepo, Manuel Busquets. The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexis himself is fatally gunned down, grief-stricken Fernando hunts for his young lover's killer in the Medellin slums, but instead encounters Wilmar, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Alexis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250809/","name":"La virgen de los sicarios","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgyZGY1OGYtOTRlMy00OWJhLThjYTItZTcxOTdmMDhiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The tempestuous love story between Fernando, an older man who has recently returned to his crime-ridden drug capitol hometown of Medellin, Colombia and the gun-happy 16-year-old assassin Alexis, who murders all too easily. When Alexi","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250809/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eroka","dateCreated":"2001-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A realistic and subversive film","reviewBody":"I saw the film at the Jerusalem Film Festival. It was a rather late screening, but the viewers were glued to their seats. It's a very gripping movie and extremely subversive in themes, language and visuals. It's very anti current-day Colombia, and no wonder the production didn't go very smoothly. Still I admire the support the film got from `official' institutions in Medellion. It's subversive in themes, because we basically have a gay couple, an older man (about 40-50) who indulges in having sex with minor boys (who do this willingly, and yet, it's rather shocking to the average viewer) in return for financial support, or rather indulging the boys in whatever they want to do. The couple goes around the city and is critical of every facet of the city  and rightly so  yet the tone is overtly cynical and `evil'. The lead boy, Alexis, goes around and kills whomever is threatening him and his sugar-daddy  I think he executed 4 people once a confrontation was about to happen, and 4 more were other kids who were after him. S this shooting spree is depicted in a somewhat accepting manner, as if this is the way to do these things in Colombia. They ridicule almost every aspect of life  church, police, government, the drug lords, poor and beggars, the bourgeoisie, other gays, and even themselves. In that respect, it's a very Pasolini movie, although the realism here is a real one and not made for the sake of a socialist agenda. The writer and his two boy-lovers are very lost, although they always know where they are, and the ending is pretty bad, as expected. The film shows no hope for the Colombian people, as they are stuck in a country ran by corrupt officials, gangs and drug lords. The writer has great lines, one of my favorite was about him hating people who whistle, because they shouldn't try and imitate the art that was given to the birds A good movie, with a 7/10 as far as I can say. Acting-wise  since I don't speak Spanish, it was credible to my ears, though the boys did seem to quote their lines mechanically at times.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-09-20","keywords":"male full frontal nudity,teenage boy,male frontal nudity,anti natalism,antinatalism","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Our Lady of the Assassins","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1634731801","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBlOTBiYzktZmQ0My00YmI3LThlMzgtN2JhZDVlZTAzZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film from Barbet Schroeder","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0418554/","name":"Germán Jaramillo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050774/","name":"Anderson Ballesteros","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720461/","name":"Juan David Restrepo"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0775447/","name":"Barbet Schroeder"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052216/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086602/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0884982/","name":"Fernando Vallejo"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: II koncert na wiolonczelę i orkiestrę
programme.desc: Pasją okulisty Macieja Gasika jest muzyka. W trakcie jednego z koncertów mężczyzna doznaje udaru mózgu. Staje się więźniem własnego ciała. Postanawia się nie poddawać i zawalczyć o swoją godność oraz wolność. Film na podstawie prawdziwej historii. Scenariusz stworzono do koncertu wiolonczelowego Pawła Mykietyna.

programme.title: Honour
Honorowe zabójstwo
Honour
programme.desc: Honour: With Keeley Hawes, Mark Stanley, Michael Jibson, Alexa Davies. DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10535076/","name":"Honour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBmMjVhMTktOTdiMS00OTBiLWE5MzAtMjdlYWU0NDFmNjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTMyODgwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"DCI Caroline Goode vows to bring justice for a young girl, murdered by her family for falling in love with the wrong man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10535076/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"InnerWisdom1000"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Necessary Viewing for All","reviewBody":"Firstly, I would like to express my disappointment at so many reviewers here who simply missed the key point of this production: the killing ( or so-called honour killing ) of another human being as a defence of one's culture or religion or for any other reason. In this case the reprehensible, degrading and evil treatment of women by segments of men whose actions can only be described as vile, caustic, inhuman and downright evil. So many viewers sadly glossed over this fundamental issue. Sadly.\n\nOf course we can give our views on whether there were too few episodes or not enough, or how true or not the events depicted relate to what actually happened, or whether the director or production team or actors excelled themselves or not. For me, they were all excellent. But that is to miss the point: murder is never justified under ANY circumstances. No matter your family or cultural upbringing. No matter your religion or any other justification. That a young girl ( or anyone for that matter ) should be so inhumanly and despicably treated - culminating in her murder - is something which should outrage all of us...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2063,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-09-28","keywords":"missing woman,police,london england,2000s,based on true story","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0369954/","name":"Keeley Hawes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4440305/","name":"Mark Stanley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1106960/","name":"Michael Jibson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0677560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0752152/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0685539/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Honour","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi193249561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwZmFmNjktYWIxMi00ZGQwLTk2ODAtNTE1MGM3Y2QxNjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDYwZmFmNjktYWIxMi00ZGQwLTk2ODAtNTE1MGM3Y2QxNjYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Honour"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Sauver ou périr: Directed by Frédéric Tellier. With Pierre Niney, Anaïs Demoustier, Vincent Rottiers, Chloé Stefani. The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7210426/","name":"Sauver ou périr","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWFhZWMzNWItMGNkYi00ZTlkLTgxZGQtOTVlOTJlMDU1MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7210426/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ronevickers"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Memorable & Emotional Film.","reviewBody":"This is a quite magnificent film on so many counts. Inspired by true events, this story of the human spirit, overcoming all the odds, will remain long in the memory. Everything about it is top notch - direction, cinematography, script and, most of all, the acting. All play their parts exceptionally well, with Pierre Niney in the lead role being particularly outstanding. His range of emotions, in a difficult part, dominate the film, and he confirms the fact that he is a brilliant actor. This is a must see movie for anyone who appreciates film making at its best.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-11-28","keywords":"fireman,fire,fireman training,building on fire,fire fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2670312217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2582755/","name":"Pierre Niney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1326732/","name":"Anaïs Demoustier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196219/","name":"Vincent Rottiers"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0536467/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261946/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1190532/","name":"David Oelhoffen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

All play their parts exceptionally well, with Pierre Niney in the lead role being particularly outstanding. programme.title: The Rossellinis
Klan Rossellinich
The Rossellinis
programme.desc:
The Rossellinis: Directed by Alessandro Rossellini, Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho. With Alessandro Rossellini, Isabella Rossellini, Renzo Rossellini, Roberto Rossellini. This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12749696/","name":"The Rossellinis","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkxOTA1YzItNmIzNS00OGM1LTk5NmEtYmE3YWQwY2E4MTA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ0MjA3Njk@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12749696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nickrogers1969"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fascinating to watch","reviewBody":"This is a very interesting documentary about a big and famous family. The director, who is a grandchild of Roberto Rosselini, has made a loving portrait of his aunts and uncles. The director seems to be a nice and warm person and he has much love for his family living across the world.

My observations about the family after having watched it is that Ingrid Bergman's daughter Ingrid Rosselini is the true beauty of the family. Elletra, Isabella's daughter, would not be working as a model if it were not for her famous mother. The scene with Isabella modelling on the runway with her children is lame.

The scenes of the director with his mother were the most touching in the film and is what stays with me. There seems to be a warm close bond between them despite them not having seen each other for years. Those scenes were the most hopeful and intimate.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Documentary","Biography","History"],"datePublished":"2020-10-26","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000618/","name":"Isabella Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744022/","name":"Renzo Rossellini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5030454/","name":"Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258681/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3324087/","name":"Andrea Paolo Massara"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3309810/","name":"Davis Simanis Jr."}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

After his ninth unsuccessful attempt on his own life, a young man outsources his suicide to an ageing assassin. "If you're serious about ending it, you need professional help"" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3525168/","name":"Dead in a Week (Or Your Money Back)","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxMjQzMzY3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTk5OTE3NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After his ninth unsuccessful attempt on his own life, a young man outsources his suicide to an ageing assassin. programme.title: Ma-nyeo
Wiedźma
Ma-nyeo
programme.desc: Ma-nyeo: Directed by Young-sun Yoo. With Joo-hee Park, Soo-yoon Na, Mi-so Lee, Ye-jin Sin. Saeyoung is a new employee who eventually stands against Leesun, her stubborn team leader. Leesun is upset by Saeyoung's behavior, but she soon learns about ominous stories about Saeyoung. As the stories about Saeyoung are revealed one after another, she becomes a source of fear to Leesun. Saeyoung's stalking-like bullying continues, and Leesun tries to run away from her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4230796/","name":"Ma-nyeo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2M1ZTNiY2EtMWM0Zi00ZWUwLWFhMzAtZDZlYWI0MGI5MTg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc0MTEzMzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Saeyoung is a new employee who eventually stands against Leesun, her stubborn team leader. Leesun is upset by Saeyoung's behavior, but she soon learns about ominous stories about Saeyoung. As the stories about Saeyoung are revealed o","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4230796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dongillette"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Eerie psychological/supernatural thriller","reviewBody":"Takes a while to get into it, but once you do, you'll be engrossed. The main character is a very strange young woman--with a very strange background--who believes she's possessed by a ghost. And she may be, we never really know that for certain. The film vacillates between a psychological thriller and a supernatural suspense drama but the viewer's never really sure which one they're watching. There are no cheap jump-thrills, no overt scares, but there's a distinct "uncomfortableness" that surrounds the entire thing. You might find it slow, you might find it difficult to get in to, but it's well worth the hour and a half to watch it. The resolution is great.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-09-11","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6844186/","name":"Joo-hee Park"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3797434/","name":"Soo-yoon Na"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3514839/","name":"Mi-so Lee"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2726242/","name":"Young-sun Yoo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2726242/","name":"Young-sun Yoo"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pit Fighter
Niepokonany
Pit Fighter
programme.desc: Pit Fighter: Directed by Jesse V. Johnson. With Dominiquie Vandenberg, Steven Bauer, Fernando Carrillo, Stephen Graham. Jack Severino has no memory, all he knows is the brutal sport of Pit Fighting. When his past catches him up, he realizes he is not who he thought he was. For some men must fight for redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396096/","name":"Pit Fighter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI4MWYwODAtMWE3MS00ZDg3LWEyM2ItNmYxZGU0MGM2YTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Severino has no memory, all he knows is the brutal sport of Pit Fighting. When his past catches him up, he realizes he is not who he thought he was. For some men must fight for redemption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bolidul"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not very good, but entertaining","reviewBody":"This movie is all about fighting ("no rules" type of fighting) and shooting. Don't look for anything else, because you won't find it. In my opinion, there are movies (like "Chek law dak gung - Naked Weapon" or this one) that can not be judged by their artistic value. They are not supposed to make you think, to impress you, to make a difference. They are simply made for entertaining. This movie is not very good, but fighting and shooting scenes are done pretty well, even though that stuff that's supposed to be blood doesn't look at all like the real thing. Some of the scenes are more violent than usual, because it is brutal street fighting we are talking about here, not those stylish, beautifully choreographed fight scenes we can find in most of Jet Li's movies.\n\nMy rating: 6 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1152,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2008-05-23","keywords":"dog fighting,pit fighter,wrestling,wrestler,gangster","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888664/","name":"Dominiquie Vandenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000874/","name":"Steven Bauer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0140488/","name":"Fernando Carrillo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425364/","name":"Jesse V. Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119824/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425364/","name":"Jesse V. Johnson"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Thousand Kisses Deep
Tysiąc pocałunków w głąb
A Thousand Kisses Deep
programme.desc:
A Thousand Kisses Deep: Directed by Dana Lustig. With Emilia Fox, Jodie Whittaker, David Warner, Dougray Scott. An unsettling drama that cinematically captures and recreates the psycho-analytic experience." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1565069/","name":"A Thousand Kisses Deep","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMDQzNDA5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjEwMDQyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unsettling drama that cinematically captures and recreates the psycho-analytic experience.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1565069/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rooprect"},"dateCreated":"2014-04-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"They always fall for the trumpet player","reviewBody":"In case you're wondering, yes, "A Thousand Kisses Deep" takes its name as well as its somber mood from the 2001 Leonard Cohen song "A Thousand Kisses Deep". But for Cohen fans, I don't remember hearing the song in the film, only the lyrics spoken at the beginning and end. So, much like the movie "Starman" which does not have the Bowie song, it's a bit of a bummer.

If you can get past that, no problem.

The film itself is like a blend of "The Lake House", "The Time Traveler's Wife" and "Sleeping with the Enemy" with maybe a dash of "Angel Heart" with its sexuality and diabolical symbolism. It takes a deliberately fragmented, psueudo-supernatural approach, challenging the viewer like in "The Lake House". It features a character traveling through time like in "The Time Traveler's Wife", and it revolves around a quietly abusive relationship between a man & a woman like in "Sleeping with the Enemy". Throw them all together and mix vigorously with a dash of very nice jazz trumpet music, and there you have "A Thousand Kisses Deep".

It is NOT a "science fiction" as I've read in some places (why do people see "time travel" and immediately think HG Welles and Star Trek??). And it's definitely not a "romance", unless your idea of romance includes borderline rape, borderline paedophilia and something even worse which I won't ruin for you. It's not a straightforward thriller because there's not really any terror. So this film is pretty hard to classify except to say that it's the story of a woman who is trying to fix her past, present and future before it ends in disaster.

By the way, although I just threw a bunch of spooky themes at you (rape, paedophilia, etc), don't worry because the film is not explicit or graphic in any way. It implies a lot of things, but I don't think there's any nudity other than Jodie Whittaker's backside shown through a closet door. This subtle style of filmmaking is prevalent in the whole movie, which means there aren't a lot of melodramatic clichés or people shouting & breaking things. What's funny is that the *lack* of action/violence makes the film even more sinister to me.

Another interesting spin is the way the story is very dreamlike--symbolic and metaphoric rather than realistic--so you don't get caught up analyzing plot details. For example, the time traveler is never recognized by any of the other characters even though you'd think they would. Also, settings don't change either, and although some characters age expectedly, others stay the same. It sets an interesting tone, as if telling us (like a dream) that certain appearances are not as important as their meaning.

This is director Dana Lustig's latest film credit (as of 2014), and I hope there are many more to come. It is one of the rare thrillers with a female perspective which I (a guy) find so much more provocative than the standard Hollywood thrillers about some dude who's steamrolling through the story trying to be cool. "A Thousand Kisses Deep" has just enough enough pauses for reflection while maintaining its momentum. Definitely give this a whirl if you're looking for a movie that's pensive yet provocative and certainly different from all the rest.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Romance","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-06-15","keywords":"four word title,title directed by female,written by director,female protagonist,abusive boyfriend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Thousand Kisses Deep","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1763615513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlmODJlMmYtNDIzNi00OTcwLThjYzgtYTUxZDljZWQ3MTg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlmODJlMmYtNDIzNi00OTcwLThjYzgtYTUxZDljZWQ3MTg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for A Thousand Kisses Deep"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0288976/","name":"Emilia Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2092886/","name":"Jodie Whittaker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001831/","name":"David Warner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527325/","name":"Dana Lustig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0293122/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476384/","name":"Alex Kustanovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3730130/","name":"Vadim Moldovan"}],"duration":"PT1H24M"}</script><metacontent="

If you can get past that, no problem.

The film itself is like a blend of "The Lake House", "The Time Traveler's Wife" and "Sleeping with the Enemy" with maybe a dash of "Angel Heart" with its sexuality and diabolical symbolism. It takes a deliberately fragmented, psueudo-supernatural approach, challenging the viewer like in "The Lake House". It features a character traveling through time like in "The Time Traveler's Wife", and it revolves around a quietly abusive relationship between a man & a woman like in "Sleeping with the Enemy". Throw them all together and mix vigorously with a dash of very nice jazz trumpet music, and there you have "A Thousand Kisses Deep".

It is NOT a "science fiction" as I've read in some places (why do people see "time travel" and immediately think HG Welles and Star Trek??). And it's definitely not a "romance", unless your idea of romance includes borderline rape, borderline paedophilia and something even worse which I won't ruin for you. It's not a straightforward thriller because there's not really any terror. So this film is pretty hard to classify except to say that it's the story of a woman who is trying to fix her past, present and future before it ends in disaster.

By the way, although I just threw a bunch of spooky themes at you (rape, paedophilia, etc), don't worry because the film is not explicit or graphic in any way. It implies a lot of things, but I don't think there's any nudity other than Jodie Whittaker's backside shown through a closet door. This subtle style of filmmaking is prevalent in the whole movie, which means there aren't a lot of melodramatic clichés or people shouting & breaking things. What's funny is that the *lack* of action/violence makes the film even more sinister to me.

Another interesting spin is the way the story is very dreamlike--symbolic and metaphoric rather than realistic--so you don't get caught up analyzing plot details. For example, the time traveler is never recognized by any of the other characters even though you'd think they would. Also, settings don't change either, and although some characters age expectedly, others stay the same. It sets an interesting tone, as if telling us (like a dream) that certain appearances are not as important as their meaning.

This is director Dana Lustig's latest film credit (as of 2014), and I hope there are many more to come. It is one of the rare thrillers with a female perspective which I (a guy) find so much more provocative than the standard Hollywood thrillers about some dude who's steamrolling through the story trying to be cool. "A Thousand Kisses Deep" has just enough enough pauses for reflection while maintaining its momentum. Definitely give this a whirl if you're looking for a movie that's pensive yet provocative and certainly different from all the rest.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Romance","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-06-15","keywords":"four word title,title directed by female,written by director,female protagonist,abusive boyfriend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Thousand Kisses Deep","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1763615513","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlmODJlMmYtNDIzNi00OTcwLThjYzgtYTUxZDljZWQ3MTg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDlmODJlMmYtNDIzNi00OTcwLThjYzgtYTUxZDljZWQ3MTg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for A Thousand Kisses Deep","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0288976/","name":"Emilia Fox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2092886/","name":"Jodie Whittaker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001831/","name":"David Warner"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527325/","name":"Dana Lustig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0293122/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476384/","name":"Alex Kustanovich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3730130/","name":"Vadim Moldovan"],"duration":"PT1H24M"</script><metacontent="

Géminis
programme.desc:
Géminis: Directed by Albertina Carri. With Cristina Banegas, Daniel Fanego, Lucas Escariz, María Abadi. A domineering mother with a seemingly perfect family in Argentina, is unaware of a taboo relationship happening between her youngest twin children." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0366544/","name":"Géminis","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY0Mjc4MzM2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzAxNzQ4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A domineering mother with a seemingly perfect family in Argentina, is unaware of a taboo relationship happening between her youngest twin children.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0366544/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvinashPatalay"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Taboo Aesthetic","reviewBody":"Happened to watch this movie late night when it was aired on World movies channel. At the outset the director needs to acknowledged for holding the reigns quite well and literally does a tight-rope walking to ensure that the movie doesn't classified as a Tinto Brass or worse a soft-porn. 

The complexities of a modern family is portrayed effectively. The relationship between the members of the family is fleshed out effectively yet managing to touch-base on the taboo. The wedding forms the baseline of the story and the events built around it come about naturally (family dinner, shopping, wedding dress, night-out etc). And its precisely these factors which give aesthetic feel to it. On technical front the movie is rich in the camera-work and lighting. The usage of mirrors, shadows and following the character would seem Kubrick inspired. 

The director chose his way of ending the story which is purely is his prerogative which perhaps for a few it might seem Over-the-top.

PS:: And an apt title indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1243,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-06-09","keywords":"incest,caught having sex,male frontal nudity,bare breasts,female full frontal nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051822/","name":"Cristina Banegas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266723/","name":"Daniel Fanego"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1738113/","name":"Lucas Escariz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0140337/","name":"Albertina Carri"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108406/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097718/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0140337/","name":"Albertina Carri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320622/","name":"Santiago Giralt"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

Aces 'N Eights
programme.desc:
Aces 'N' Eights: Directed by Craig R. Baxley. With Casper Van Dien, Bruce Boxleitner, Ernest Borgnine, Jeff Kober. Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the shoulders of an elderly rancher and an accomplished, but retired, gunslinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1087828/","name":"Aces 'N' Eights","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMzAyNjQxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzE2MTIzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Already taking a gamble settling in the uncharted west, the peaceful settlers of a town destined for railroad greatness suddenly find themselves being ruthlessly gunned down. With no law and order to be found, justice falls onto the ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1087828/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bkoganbing"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just a right of way,","reviewBody":"Casper Van Dien stars in Aces 'N' Eights as a former gunslinger in Jeff Kober's band of thugs for hire who up and quits and decides to settle down and lead a peaceful life. Rancher Ernest Borgnine takes him in and life goes well.

That is until Kober's murderous band gets hired by William Atherton of the railroad and he wants a lot of ranches cleared out. And Kober is a man who enjoys killing to make that happen.

I have to say this was a strange western for someone who's seen more than his share. Most of the time if the plot involved the railroad coming through it was a good thing and it was bad guys who had insider knowledge of that happening trying to push people off their land. In some cases it was the railroad, most famously in the Tyrone Power classic Jesse James that was strong arming people off their property, but just killing them? After all, the railroad just wants a right of way, enough room to lay down their tracks.

Which made this western a rather dubious proposition for me. Still there's enough action to satisfy any western fan. There's also an adroit performance Bruce Boxleitner as one of Kober's men who plays a distinctly lone hand.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":741,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-15","keywords":"rancher,railroad,main character shot,torture,opening action scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aces 'N Eights","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi179634457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MzYwODYtZGJkMi00NGQ3LWI3NTAtZTJmNjc0ZDlhOTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Grand Army"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000680/","name":"Casper Van Dien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000310/","name":"Bruce Boxleitner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000308/","name":"Ernest Borgnine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062644/","name":"Craig R. programme.title: The Condemned
Potępiony
The Condemned
programme.desc:
The Condemned: Directed by Scott Wiper. With Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone, Tory Mussett. Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443473/","name":"The Condemned","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkyOTczMjU0M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDExMzM0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is "purchased" by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers f","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443473/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rawiri42"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Did some people miss the clue?","reviewBody":"There are lots of pretty negative reviews of this movie and one has to wonder why those people watched it in the first place. Did they miss the essential clue as to what they would get? The opening credits clearly tell everyone that this a WWE movie. It would seem, therefore, that those who don't like the fake, meticulously staged regular offerings of World Wrestling Entertainment wouldn't want to watch this either. That isn't rocket science - is it?

But no, the wowsers and wet-nellies just HAD to watch it anyway - and then grumble and whinge about gratuitous violence and sadism. If they don't like professional wrestling, then there's a pretty sure chance they're not going to like The Condemned so why did they watch it at all? Mind you, I wouldn't mind betting that, if the story were ever true, those wowsers and wet-nellies would be among the first to sign up to watch the programme on the Internet - and then still complain! It's a bit like the well-known fact that the most vociferous anti-porn campaigners also happen to own the biggest collections of porn! (Of course it's all kept as "proof" of just how corrupted the world is - or so they say!)

OK, getting to this movie for what it is. It is a B-grade action flick with mostly B-grade actors (although there ar a few exceptions to that). Personally, I thought the story concept was quite good. The real protagonist is an entrepreneurial guy who knows that an awful lot of people actually do like gratuitous violence (he probably did research on how many viewers professional wrestling gets) and decides to convert that into a reality show. The problem is that no self-respecting TV network would ever run it and so he resorts to the obvious and puts it, live streaming on the Internet.

Without wanting to introduce any spoilers, I will stick to what the film's own promos state, which is that ten convicted criminals from death-rows around the world (another clever ploy to ensure that the maximum audience can be secured to support "their" champion) are let loose on an island which is rigged with numerous cameras and told that they must each defend themselves against the other nine as only one of them can ultimately survive. The survivor will be freed with a new identity and a big wad of money to go and do whatever he likes. There are a few little "twists" thrown in for good measure and I'll leave those who want to watch it to find out what they are. I found that I was placing myself into the shoes of each of the criminals and wondering how I could make the best of the situation. Of course, the first thing I had to do was remember that I was already sentenced to death and then view the situation from that standpoint. Secondly, I had to remember that my opponents were also killers and thus there was no room for compassion on either their parts or mine.

With that frame-of-mind established, I found myself entering into the story with a different attitude than I would have had it been presented differently. I was reminded of "Running Man" as far as the plot went but the difference was that this movie is set in the present and, as such, was (with some imagination) "believable."

OK, 'nuff said. If you don't mind action with lots of violence, then you will probably enjoy The Condemned. If you like Mary Poppins and romances, then don't watch this movie. Simple really!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51401,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-04-27","keywords":"island,last man standing,website,jungle,tied feet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Condemned (2007)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4169335321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE2Mzk5MDYtMDM0Mi00Y2E0LWJhMzMtNzJmYTE3OTc4ZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmE2Mzk5MDYtMDM0Mi00Y2E0LWJhMzMtNzJmYTE3OTc4ZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this film about a deadly game show"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042524/","name":"Steve Austin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005068/","name":"Vinnie Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428923/","name":"Nathan Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007045/","name":"Scott Wiper"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135725/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007045/","name":"Scott Wiper"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373154/","name":"Rob Hedden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0373151/","name":"Andy Hedden"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Doom
Doom
programme.desc: Doom: Directed by Andrzej Bartkowiak. With Karl Urban, Rosamund Pike, Deobia Oparei, Ben Daniels. Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0419706/","name":"Doom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2QwMzZiYmUtNGZhMC00ZjA2LWI2MDYtOWEyNDA4MzYwMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0419706/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JERICH9478"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Rock and a BFG Make entertaining viewing","reviewBody":"OK, we are all hearing how Doom the movie is a complete sellout etc, but still this is an enjoyable movie. The Rock as Sarge is absolutely perfect! i just couldn't imagine Karl Urban doing a better job then The Rock when it comes to Sarge. Although many have branded this film "Resident Evil in Space" and yeah it is but that doesn't subtract from the film at all. The 1st person scene was especially pulled off well and will give you some giggles (c'mon who didn't laugh?).The Score is absolutely awesome and sets the atmosphere perfectly! too me this film had an old school 80's horror feel to it which i felt made it that more enjoyable (we got lots of uncensored over the top gore which now we don't get enough of). Overall don't judge this movie till you see it because it is a lot better then people rate it unless your looking to find something thats a 100% identical too its source material (Doom 3) then i'd advise you to not watch this film because some of it has been completely rewritten from its original context hence no hell. Overall a lot better then what i was expecting too see","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111254,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2005-11-30","keywords":"survival,brother sister relationship,based on video game,monster,hell","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3115565337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881631/","name":"Karl Urban"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005647/","name":"Andrzej Bartkowiak"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0834338/","name":"Wesley Strick"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0419706/","name":"Doom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2QwMzZiYmUtNGZhMC00ZjA2LWI2MDYtOWEyNDA4MzYwMTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0419706/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"JERICH9478","dateCreated":"2005-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Rock and a BFG Make entertaining viewing","reviewBody":"OK, we are all hearing how Doom the movie is a complete sellout etc, but still this is an enjoyable movie. The Rock as Sarge is absolutely perfect! i just couldn't imagine Karl Urban doing a better job then The Rock when it comes to Sarge. Although many have branded this film "Resident Evil in Space" and yeah it is but that doesn't subtract from the film at all. The 1st person scene was especially pulled off well and will give you some giggles (c'mon who didn't laugh?).The Score is absolutely awesome and sets the atmosphere perfectly! too me this film had an old school 80's horror feel to it which i felt made it that more enjoyable (we got lots of uncensored over the top gore which now we don't get enough of). Overall don't judge this movie till you see it because it is a lot better then people rate it unless your looking to find something thats a 100% identical too its source material (Doom 3) then i'd advise you to not watch this film because some of it has been completely rewritten from its original context hence no hell. Overall a lot better then what i was expecting too see","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111254,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2005-11-30","keywords":"survival,brother sister relationship,based on video game,monster,hell","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3115565337","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDBkNDhhOGQtMmY3ZS00ZTc3LTkxOTEtNDViNTkyZTM1NjU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881631/","name":"Karl Urban","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005647/","name":"Andrzej Bartkowiak"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037310/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175035/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0834338/","name":"Wesley Strick"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
Halloween 6: Przekleństwo Michaela Myersa
Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers
programme.desc:
Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers: Directed by Joe Chappelle. With Donald Pleasence, Paul Rudd, Marianne Hagan, Mitchell Ryan. Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113253/","name":"Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ3MjgzMWMtMjJhMy00MmVjLTllMzMtMWVjMmMxNTIzNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six years after Michael Myers last terrorized Haddonfield, he returns there in pursuit of his niece, Jamie Lloyd, who has escaped with her newborn child, for which Michael and a mysterious cult have sinister plans.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as bad as people make out.","reviewBody":"By this stage the franchise had really gotten tired, the previous few had been very poor, almost an insult to the fabulous original.

Of the first six films I would place this third overall, after one and two. It doesn't deserve its reputation as a bad film, because it isn't bad, nor is it great.

On the plus side, it has some scary moments, Michael's character is well used. The acting in general is rather good, it's quite slick, in a nineties way. On the debit side, the story is a little far fetched, and I didn't particularly like the cult element, it's like they tried to rewrite the show's past. It's a bit silly I guess, but....

At least it has Paul Rudd and the wonderful Donald Pleasance.

Not that bad. 6/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35067,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1995-09-29","keywords":"halloween,slasher,hospital,knife,occult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Halloween 6: The Curse of Michael Myers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1391435289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2EyZjNiMDEtZTk5NC00YzBlLTllY2MtYzdhYWFhNzNmYWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2EyZjNiMDEtZTk5NC00YzBlLTllY2MtYzdhYWFhNzNmYWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000587/","name":"Donald Pleasence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748620/","name":"Paul Rudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353238/","name":"Marianne Hagan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152640/","name":"Joe Chappelle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0756494/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091393/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0384185/","name":"Debra Hill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000118/","name":"John Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268107/","name":"Daniel Farrands"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="
