IMDb data; ttnr: 0253474, Title: The Pianist, --- Description: The Pianist: Directed by Roman Polanski. With Adrien Brody, Emilia Fox, Michal Zebrowski, Ed Stoppard. A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0253474/","name":"The Pianist","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWRiZDIxZjktMTA1NC00MDQ2LWEzMjUtMTliZmY3NjQ3ODJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0253474/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ashcoounter","dateCreated":"2003-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliantly Narrated, Visually Stunning!","reviewBody":"Polanski has depicted the gory details of the holocaust without much restraint. But, the most wonderful aspect of the film is that the director has not lost focus of his story and instead of focusing too much on the holocaust horror he has weaved the true-life narrative of survival around devillish happenings.

Every single act of escapade Szpilman goes through is depicted like a drop of water on a barren desert. However, the Oasis in the driest desert comes in the end and it is here that Polanski captures the essence of human emotion. I had this very strong urge of jumping into the theater screen and magically adopting a character in the movie and doing something about the helplesness portrayed so convincingly.

Overall, Polanski has given a stunning visual narrative of the cold war. Survival indeed is a privilege though it is taken for granted today. Performances by Brody, Kretschmann deserve applause.

Pawel Edelman's camera work is moving and he has brilliantly captured the dark sadness in the visual canvas in an effective way. The lighting is amazing. Pre-dawn shooting schedule could have helped a great deal.

Hervé de Luze's editing work has ensured that the narrative does not slip away from focus. Most notable is the scene where the human bodies are lit on fire and the camera raises to show the smoke. The darkness of the smoke is enhanced and is used effectively to fade the scene out.

The scene where Brody's fingers move as he rests his hands on the bars of the tram handle only goes to show the brilliance of Polanski as a film-maker.

Great film that will be in the running for this year's Oscars. I will give it a 9 Out of 10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":777302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"(Banned)","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"pianist,holocaust,survival,nazi occupied poland,person in a wheelchair falls from height","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pianist","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi988938521","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ4MWQzNDEtYmI4Zi00NmY0LWEwYTEtZTg4MmQ3MDM2YmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQ4MWQzNDEtYmI4Zi00NmY0LWEwYTEtZTg4MmQ3MDM2YmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Focus Features","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004778/","name":"Adrien Brody","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470981/","name":"Thomas Kretschmann","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277975/","name":"Frank Finlay"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000591/","name":"Roman Polanski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024473/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030304/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053177/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0844262/","name":"Wladyslaw Szpilman"],"duration":"PT2H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Podwodny świat Jaskini Ordyńskiej
programme.desc: Znajdująca się na Uralu Jaskinia Ordyńska to największa na świecie podwodna gipsowa grota. Ponad pięciokilometrowy labirynt komnat i korytarzy jest celem wizyt eksploratorów oraz nurków. Twórcy dokumentu przedstawiają pionierskie próby sfilmowania jaskini w 4K. Widzowie zobaczą miejsce niepodobne do żadnego innego i dowiedzą się, jak ono powstało.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
Moja gwiazda: Teen Spirit
Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Teen Spirit: Directed by Max Minghella. With Elle Fanning, Agnieszka Grochowska, Archie Madekwe, Zlatko Buric. Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by a pop-fueled soundtrack, Teen Spirit is a visceral and stylish spin on the Cinderella story." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6483364/","name":"Teen Spirit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk0MmFmMDAtNDY0YS00MTk2LTkwMGItYWQ5M2U4MzM0ZWM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violet is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition. Driven by","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483364/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good!!","reviewBody":"Teen Spirit is a very well made musical drama. Elle Fanning delivers an excellent lead performance. She shines throughout this film. The supporting cast also does a good job in this film. The film is very well directed by first timer Max Minghella. The film is very stylish, and makes good use of its pop soundtrack. You are never bored during its runtime, even when you know where this film is going. Easily the film's main weaknesses is its storyline. You know where the film is going right from the start. But it's so well done that you can forgive it. Overall, this isn't anything really new, but it's well made enough to keep you entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8463,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-04-19","keywords":"singer,singing,bar singer,bar,horse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3412245017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTUzYTJmNTItZGQ1Yi00Y2E0LWJkMDAtNDkwMjU2NDQ1MGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTUzYTJmNTItZGQ1Yi00Y2E0LWJkMDAtNDkwMjU2NDQ1MGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violet (Elle Fanning) dreams of pop stardom to escape her small town and shattered family life. Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MissPearBanana"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awwww","reviewBody":"I saw this movie on Thursdays night after having a really boring day. I had no expectations, those I had were rather negative. Being that the only movie I've ever watched Jimmy in is the American version of Taxi with Queen Latifah(?)...don't ask why! But seriously..this movie is so cute! Drew Barrymore is always sweet, but I almost fell in love with Fallon's character. Why can't I meet a cute nerd like that. :) Movies like that are excellent. Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. Probably the fact that we don't have that sport here in Norway.\n\n(My first comment ever.) Haha","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44332,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-04-08","keywords":"mri,boston red sox,baltimore orioles,world series,ups","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fever Pitch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4121297177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266422/","name":"Jimmy Fallon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1555151/","name":"Jason Spevack"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005838/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304665/","name":"Lowell Ganz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541632/","name":"Babaloo Mandel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394984/","name":"Nick Hornby"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Tremors: Shrieker Island: Directed by Don Michael Paul. With Michael Gross, Jon Heder, Richard Brake, Caroline Langrishe. When a group of hunters genetically modify Graboid eggs, they face an all-out war against the larger, terrifyingly intelligent Graboids, and the swiftly multiplying Shriekers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8322060/","name":"Tremors: Shrieker Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc0NTkwZWQtZDJkZC00MWVjLWIyZWMtYTEyZTJmNmM1Y2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a group of hunters genetically modify Graboid eggs, they face an all-out war against the larger, terrifyingly intelligent Graboids, and the swiftly multiplying Shriekers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8322060/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"torrascotia"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tremors in Thailand or Tremors meets Predator","reviewBody":"This is by far the best in the newer sequels episodes of Tremors. Its obvious from the start that this is very different movie in tone and in production values than anything which appeared after the initial trilogy. This is a much more serious and darker film, gone is the comedic tone and in its place we get much better action sequences and a real air of menace. There definite and deliberate nods to the movie Predator, particularly in the action scenes. One in particular midway through the movie is simply the best action scene in any Tremors movie. The production values for this are probably the best in the franchise. We have stunning visuals as this is set in Thailand which gives the movie a kind of Jurassic Park prehistoric vibe but the cinematography is worth a mention. Probably a first for a Tremors movie. The cast are great and unexpectedly (to me any) Jon Heder shows up as does an English actress mainly known for TV shows who plays Berts ex love interest, Fans of the franchise will be more than happy with this edition although there is an obvious departure from the previous formula. This perhaps signals an end to either the saga or possibly a shift away to a new Tremors series of movies. I wouldn't complain if they did based on this episode. I gave this a 6 however as its still a Tremors movie and partly for the ending...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3773,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-10-20","keywords":"sequel,seventh part,direct to video sequel to theatrical movie,island,view through binoculars","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tremors: Shrieker Island","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4072522009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjhmNzE5MzQtZmI2NC00OGY1LWEyYzUtY2JlOTJjMzZkNjM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjhmNzE5MzQtZmI2NC00OGY1LWEyYzUtY2JlOTJjMzZkNjM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0343447/","name":"Michael Gross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417647/","name":"Jon Heder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104114/","name":"Richard Brake"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666806/","name":"Don Michael Paul"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0082064/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0359888/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666806/","name":"Don Michael Paul"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014503/","name":"Brian Brightly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. programme.title: Été 85
Lato '85
Été 85
programme.desc: Été 85: Directed by François Ozon. With Félix Lefebvre, Benjamin Voisin, Philippine Velge, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi. French teenager Alexis's boat capsizes, and he is rescued by David, who ends up as his boyfriend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10457128/","name":"Été 85","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjNlZDcyMjQtMjk0Mi00Y2EzLWE3ZjMtMGE1MDZmMjJiMzY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA3MDk2NDg2._V1_.jpg","description":"French teenager Alexis's boat capsizes, and he is rescued by David, who ends up as his boyfriend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10457128/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"schorschi100"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A teen love story with too much drama but not enough development","reviewBody":"I decided to watch the movie with mixed feelings. The plot seemed not intriguing enough, but Ozon's name is (or at least was) a certain guarantee. Alas, the disappointment prevailed. In 8 femmes, Ozon managed to keep an unforgiving and at the same time uncommenting eye into the human behavior. The behavior itself developed the characters, and brought them together into a whole. Eté 85 is a mixture of Ozon and a try to mimic Almadóvar's way of looking into tragedy, which unfortunately fails completely. The scenes are great, the actors true to their characters, but what comes out is a story swaying between a kitsch gay teenagers' love affair and a family drama. The ending is weird (I am referring to the court sentence), taking into account the fact that the subject of homosexuality was at the time socially unacceptable was extremely poorly part of the story to that point, with the exception of a vague reference to an uncle). None of the three main characters (Alexis, David and the mother, Mme Gorman) develop and their reactions throughout the film are irrational, somewhere between funny and stupid, in a combination which simply does not work. Kate's acting is miserable, same as Alexis' parents. The only convincing character, if any, is probably the social worker.\n\nConcluding, this is a mediocre film to watch if you are into gay dramas and have nothing better to do. Matches up the standards of east asian gay drama series, but not the ones of main stream cinematography, and is definitely not Ozon's most brilliant accomplishment.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7257,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-07-14","keywords":"gay,teenage boy,mother son relationship,male nudity,male rear nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3960782361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlkN2RlN2EtMDZmOS00ODE5LWIxODAtMDc2NjYxMTZiZjg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzlkN2RlN2EtMDZmOS00ODE5LWIxODAtMDc2NjYxMTZiZjg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"What do you dream of when you're 16 years old and in a seaside resort in Normandy in the 1980s? A best friend? A lifelong teen pact? Scooting off on adventures on a boat or a motorbike? Living life at breakneck speed? No. You dream of death. Because you can't get a bigger kick than dying. And that's why you save it till the very end. The summer holidays are just beginning, and this story recounts how Alexis grew into himself."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9156565/","name":"Félix Lefebvre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8308968/","name":"Benjamin Voisin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10810831/","name":"Philippine Velge"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654830/","name":"François Ozon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102303/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1525791/","name":"Aidan Chambers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654830/","name":"François Ozon"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
25 lat niewinności. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
programme.desc:
25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy: Directed by Jan Holoubek. With Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz. The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Piotr Trojan (role=Tomasz Komenda), Agata Kulesza (role=Teresa Klemanska), Dariusz Chojnacki (role=Remigiusz Korejwo), Jan Frycz (role=Prisoner 'Stary'), Lukasz Lewandowski (role=Prosecutor Robert Tomankiewicz), Mikolaj Chroboczek (role=Prosecutor Dariusz Sobieski), Andrzej Konopka (role=Commissioner Toloczko), Julian Swiezewski (role=Inspector Boguslaw Pilas), Magdalena Rózczka (role=Katarzyna Korejwo), Adam Nawojczyk (role=Prosecutor Kostrzyna), Adam Kupaj (role=Krzysztof), Piotr Szekowski (role=Gerard)

The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640","dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Oda do radosci
Oda do radości
programme.desc: Oda do radosci: Directed by Anna Kazejak, Jan Komasa, Maciej Migas. With Przemyslaw Bluszcz, Joanna Bogacka, Anna Maria Buczek, Malgorzata Buczkowska. Three stories of young disillusioned Poles of different background and region of origin. What binds them together is that they all meet on the bus to London shortly after Poland's entry into EU." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0480705/","name":"Oda do radosci","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmYyNWZjZjQtMjhmMi00ZDdjLWIzODktNGVhMTQwODUwMGEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three stories of young disillusioned Poles of different background and region of origin. What binds them together is that they all meet on the bus to London shortly after Poland's entry into EU.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0480705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"subhadeep_iitkgp"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Gorgeous","reviewBody":"This was the first Polish film I was watching, and going by the lofty cinematic standards set by Europeans I was expecting another beautifully crafted gritty drama depicting the pain of modern life- I was hardly disappointed. The film involves 3 parallel subplots( Silesia,Warsaw, The Sea) and depicts the changing lifestyle in Poland as viewed by three ambitious youngsters. Equipped with an unbelievably talented cast of young actors , Ode to Joy succeeds on every possible level of film-making. It is quite obvious that the script has been prepared with a lot of sensitivity and the direction and acting is flawless. What more could one ask from cinema?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-04-19","keywords":"anthology film,f rated,workers' strike,wedding dress,trailer home","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1669753/","name":"Przemyslaw Bluszcz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0091496/","name":"Joanna Bogacka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2929316/","name":"Anna Maria Buczek"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2038130/","name":"Anna Kazejak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717924/","name":"Jan Komasa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2034409/","name":"Maciej Migas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086499/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034872/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2038130/","name":"Anna Kazejak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717924/","name":"Jan Komasa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2034409/","name":"Maciej Migas"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Congress
Kongres
The Congress
programme.desc: The Congress: Directed by Ari Folman. With Robin Wright, Harvey Keitel, Sami Gayle, Jon Hamm. An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821641/","name":"The Congress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MTUzNDk3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTUwNTQ5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821641/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MdlndeHond"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautifully executed doom Scifi","reviewBody":"It's two movies really the first part where you feel the impending doom set upon Robin Wright as she is caught between either professionally die off soon or make a deal that takes it all. \n\nIt so vividly explores the fine line between choice and the illusion of having one. The second part has a strong resemblance to Waking Life in it's psychedelic execution more than Waltz with Bashir. Existentialism, morality, Corporatocracy and the beautiful animation make this the most marvellous yet terrifying Sci-fi I have seen in ages. Watch Harvey Keitels monologue in the first half, it is outstanding. Robin Wright is as always amazing and gets extra kudos for playing herself in an alternate universe where her career has failed. It is all together a masterpiece.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Animation","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-07-03","keywords":"female protagonist,satire,dystopia,cinema,tom cruise character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi892512537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":" \tAn aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000705/","name":"Robin Wright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232356/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052813/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501015/","name":"Stanislaw Lem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nie ten czlowiek
Nie ten człowiek
programme.desc: Nie ten czlowiek: Directed by Pawel Wendorff. With Bartosz Turzynski, Slawomir Orzechowski, Jan Frycz, Jacek Braciak. The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. Though none too convinced, he starts work as a delivery man. Having set out on his first delivery soon after he witnesses a traffic accident. He ends up giving a statement at the police station. And his plans begin to unravel. By a twist of fate Kuba has no idea about the significance of the part he will have to play on this particular day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1808335/","name":"Nie ten czlowiek","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkzODc4ZGUtNGYzZi00YzdmLWJkMWMtZDE5YzYxNThiNDJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The film is a surreal collage of interrelated threads revolving around history of thirty-year-old Kuba who, with his parents' encouragement, decides to take his first job. programme.title: Fever Pitch
Miłosna zagrywka
Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MissPearBanana"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awwww","reviewBody":"I saw this movie on Thursdays night after having a really boring day. I had no expectations, those I had were rather negative. Being that the only movie I've ever watched Jimmy in is the American version of Taxi with Queen Latifah(?)...don't ask why! But seriously..this movie is so cute! Drew Barrymore is always sweet, but I almost fell in love with Fallon's character. Why can't I meet a cute nerd like that. :) Movies like that are excellent. Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. Probably the fact that we don't have that sport here in Norway.\n\n(My first comment ever.) programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
Mój kuzyn Vinny
My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: My Cousin Vinny: Directed by Jonathan Lynn. With Joe Pesci, Ralph Macchio, Marisa Tomei, Mitchell Whitfield. Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0104952/","name":"My Cousin Vinny","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNDYzMTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk4MDgxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0104952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"linoochie"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"The more I watch it --- the funnier it gets!!","reviewBody":"Definitely one of my all-time favorite comedies. Well directed, well acted -- priceless comic performances by Pesci, Tomei, Gwynne & Austin Pendleton. And more than comedy -- there's also a lot of genuine pathos and real tension and drama, especially in the final courtroom scene. And I really don't understand the "controversy" or brouhaha over Marisa Tomei receiving the Best Supporting Actress Oscar for her role in this movie. It's a crackerjack gem of a performance and a stellar comic portrayal. The only thing I can figure is that a lot of snobbery about serious dramatic portrayals somehow being more worthy of honor than great comic performances still very much lives on in much of the film community.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116045,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1992-03-13","keywords":"lawyer,trial,italian american,alabama,jail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"My Cousin Vinny","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2744844569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000582/","name":"Joe Pesci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000673/","name":"Marisa Tomei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001494/","name":"Ralph Macchio"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528718/","name":"Jonathan Lynn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057987/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490958/","name":"Dale Launer"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

Chocolate Road
programme.desc: Chocolate Road: Directed by Tanya Chuturkova. With Frances Louise Bekele, Joe Cullen Brown, Martin Christy, Elvin Ovidio Ávila Flores. Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. On their journey, each of them finds how important it is to know the roots of their primer material - the cacao bean, and how they can highly impact the lives of the people involved in the chocolate production chain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9866220/","name":"Chocolate Road","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExMzg3NmMtMzM0ZC00M2E0LWJkMzMtNjUyZjk1NTAwZWFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjEzNjUxNTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three renowned chocolatiers - Maribel Lieberman, Susumu Koyama and Mikkel Friis-Holm - take us through the process of craft chocolate-making all the way from the tree to the final chocolate piece. programme.title: The New Mutants
Nowi mutanci
The New Mutants
programme.desc: The New Mutants: Directed by Josh Boone. With Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga. Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4682266/","name":"The New Mutants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDQ2NTdmNDgtMGIwMS00ODE2LTk5M2EtZGZhYzc4MWRlNTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc4MjczMTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4682266/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sara-691"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie desperately needed whatever they edited out.","reviewBody":"It was an OK movie all in all, but it could've been SO much better. I was personally stoked for a horror mutants movie, but this is as much horror as any other superhero movie (and less than some) so I must say I was very disappointed. The idea of was there and it could've been SO SO good but in the end, it wasn't...\n\nA thing that really distracted me was the actors weird accents. You have a group of really good actors here but the bad accents made them just seem mediocre.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-08-28","keywords":"mutant,based on comic book,marvel comics,x men,superheroine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Comic-Con Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1041219097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmIyNDQxZDgtNTY0NS00ZDcxLTkwNDgtYjQ1ZGI0NGU2ODcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Twentieth Century Studios in association with Marvel Entertainment presents The New Mutants, an original horror thriller set in an isolated hospital where a group of young mutants is being held for psychiatric monitoring. When strange occurrences begin to take place, both their new mutant abilities and their friendships will be tested as they battle to try and make it out alive. Directed by Josh Boone (The Fault in our Stars) and written by Josh Boone & Knate Lee, The New Mutants stars: Maisie Williams (Game of Thrones); Anya Taylor-Joy (Glass); Charlie Heaton (Stranger Things); Alice Braga (Predators); Blu Hunt (The Originals); and Henry Zaga (13 Reasons Why). The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

The film is produced by Simon Kinberg, p.g.a., Karen Rosenfelt and Lauren Shuler Donner with Stan Lee and Michele Imperato Stabile serving as executive producers.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3586035/","name":"Maisie Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6390427/","name":"Charlie Heaton"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1837748/","name":"Josh Boone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1029878/","name":"Knate Lee"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Water for Elephants
Woda dla słoni
Water for Elephants
programme.desc:
Water for Elephants: Directed by Francis Lawrence. With Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider. Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1067583/","name":"Water for Elephants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMDU3NDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI3MDU0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1067583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"catarinaloss"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Spectacular Show","reviewBody":"Readers, fear not. This is one adaption that lives up to the book.

Water for Elephants is pure beauty. Despite the fact that it takes place during the Depression, it makes you almost wish you lived during the '30s.

One reason is the costumes. They are wonderfully done, as well as the makeup. Another is the eye candy. No, I'm not talking about Robert Pattinson(though he looks as gorgeous as ever). I'm talking about the breathtaking cinematography, courtesy of Rodrigo Prieto.

While the leads(Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon, Christoph Waltz) all turn in GREAT performances, the real star here is Tai the elephant. She plays Rosie, the newest addition to The Benzini Bros. Most Spectacular Show on Earth, who is brought in in hopes of taking The Benzini Bros. circus to a new level(particularly to the level of Ringling Bros.).

As per usual, there are quite a few changes that may or may not irritate the readers. It all depends on the person. One that I felt was an improvement upon the book, however, was the combining of August and Uncle Al. I honestly didn't miss Al one bit.

Water for Elephants is a beautiful, enchanting, mesmerizing must-see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-04-22","keywords":"animal abuse,circus,elephant,ringmaster,train","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2: Water for Elephants","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1397594649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet, where he meets animal trainer August (Christoph Waltz) and his wife Marlena (Reese Witherspoon)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910607/","name":"Christoph Waltz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1349376/","name":"Francis Lawrence"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2717485/","name":"Sara Gruen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: البياض العظيم
Ludojad
Great White
programme.desc:
البياض العظيم: Directed by Martin Wilson. With Katrina Bowden, Aaron Jakubenko, Kimie Tsukakoshi, Tim Kano. A fun filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the surface." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8435002/","name":"Great White","alternateName":"البياض العظيم","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFmNTY0ODUtYzhiMS00YTQ4LTg1MjUtYmZlMGU4MjkyODg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fun filled flight to a remote atoll turns into a nightmare for five passengers when their seaplane is destroyed in a freak accident and they are trapped on a raft, 100 miles from shore with man-eating sharks lurking beneath the sur","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8435002/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kuarinofu"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bare-bones killer shark film","reviewBody":"Great White is as basic of a killer shark film as possible. Everyday people surviving a pack of ordinary sharks, not super-enhanced, not vengeful, nothing like the Deep Blue Sea or Jaws IV, or Meg, whatever.

My guess is that they were aiming at a more grounded approach, and it worked ok until a certain point. I think that real sharks probably wouldn't jump out of the water and intercept you mid-air in a bloody fashion, but this kinda takes away the interest from the film. They provide a bare minimum of information about the characters, but this is still a killer shark film and you expect something different from the very basic and tired concept.

My biggest problem with it was that up until 50! Minutes into the film, nothing really happens, they just wrap up the set-up. There is also a very awkward racial or ethnic conflict which I did not understand at all, it just felt super forced.

It's not spectacular, it's not gory and fun, it's not original in any way, so while I can say that it was a film, I can't think of a reason for anyone to watch it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-06-02","keywords":"nightmare,bare chested male,shark attack,boat,shark","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4129669145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0ZTFmOTItMzBlNi00ZDJjLTgyNWEtNmE2YWNkYTNiOWNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0ZTFmOTItMzBlNi00ZDJjLTgyNWEtNmE2YWNkYTNiOWNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"A blissful tourist trip turns into a nightmare when five seaplane passengers are stranded miles from shore. In a desperate bid for survival, the group try to make it to land before they either run out of supplies or are taken by a menacing terror lurking just beneath the surface."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2197298/","name":"Katrina Bowden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3472898/","name":"Aaron Jakubenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6030648/","name":"Kimie Tsukakoshi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1193365/","name":"Martin Wilson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0747933/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0858892/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0529054/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099278/","name":"Michael Boughen"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Denmark
Dania
Denmark
programme.desc:
Denmark: Directed by Adrian Shergold. With Rafe Spall, Darren Evans, Elis James, Joel Fry. A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7037712/","name":"Denmark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1ZTI5ODgtYjgwZC00MzY5LWIzNWQtNTE5NWY0MGVmMjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A down-on-his-luck Welshman travels across Europe with one crazy goal: to get himself arrested and sent to a Danish prison where the beds are warm and the water is hot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7037712/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fallyhag"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A rather fortunate story with a realistic feel","reviewBody":"The lead is Unquestionably an excellent actor. The film felt realistic. Moody, downbeat and desperate. I could feel his stress. I felt for the character. Even if I didn't really get to know him too well.

I could understand the move to Denmark but the journey there was very fortunate. It relied on sparse filming and vague story telling. You have to just accept he went from UK to Denmark in the blink of an eye and with a lot of luck.

The love interest was also another very fortunate bit of story telling. It really did start to stretch reality a little. The speed of him being alone to having dinner was a challenge. No real attempt to create a loving romance.

But this disbelief would be dwarfed by the gun And police station scenes. It was like they run out of time and tossed a coin for the ending. Super rushed and super convenient. The ending very anti-climatic, yet Subtle and A little understated.

This is not a comedy. It is a young man at the end. Hopeless. Finding a reason not to give up. The acting was good so it was easy to travel the story. I wanted more from it but what I got was okay. The lead actor is appearing in a lot of productions just lately and this film explains why. I believed his character story so that is a credit to him. I do recommend it but save it for a chilled afternoon. #WearaMask","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1329,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-07-20","keywords":"one word title,country in title,dog,bus,riding a motorbike","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1417592345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIwODJlNWEtYjRlZC00MWQ1LWFlMjQtNDhlNjhjODk5NDU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1245863/","name":"Rafe Spall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362716/","name":"Darren Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4629308/","name":"Elis James"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792120/","name":"Adrian Shergold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199178/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4074534/","name":"Jeff Murphy"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Inhale-Exhale
Wdech, wydech
Inhale-Exhale

After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5362940/","name":"Eternal Beauty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWE3ZmZhOTctOTU5Ny00MTM0LWFkZjctYjc0OWI1ZjM3MzQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5362940/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"steveo122"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"excruciating","reviewBody":"I curse the sadistic bstrds who conned me into watching what I rigorously avoid seeing by casting Sally Hawkins. programme.title: Chemia
Chemia
programme.desc:
Chemia: Directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. With Agnieszka Zulewska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Danuta Stenka, Eryk Lubos. Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. Accidentally he meets a beautiful, magnetic and mouthy Lena. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration grows when Lena not only understands his suicidal preoccupation but shares a similar one. They embark on a crazy journey during which Benek realizes he is not the only man in Lena's life - in addition, the girl has cancer, and she is not attempting to treat it. Admiration mixes with fear - finally Benek promises to accompany her to the end..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4088848/","name":"Chemia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdhMGVhM2QtNDcyNC00NWI5LThmNjUtMzQ1OGU4OWE5MDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4088848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125"},"dateCreated":"2015-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cancer vs. suicide--not a happy film","reviewBody":"The Polish film Chemia was shown in the U.S. with the title Chemo (2015). It was co-written and directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. The film stars Agnieszka Zulewska as Lena, a woman with breast cancer, and Tomasz Schuchardt as Benek, a physically healthy man obsessed with his own suicide.

When the two people met, the chemistry--while admittedly strange--is powerful. The rest of the film follows Lena and Benek as they interact with the world, with each other, and with the disease and suicide.

Agnieszka Zulewska must be the most beautiful woman in Poland. It's clear that director Prokopowicz can't take his eyes--or the camera-- off her. It unbalances the film a little, but it's truly amazing to see a skilled actor totally dominate a movie.

We saw this film at the excellent Little Theatre in Rochester, NY, as part of the High Falls Film Festival. HFFF is "Celebrating Women in Film." Since the director is a man, this film surely was chosen because of Agnieszka Zulewska's star performance. It will work well on a small screen. Try to find it and watch it--it's worth seeking out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-02","keywords":"cancer,chemo","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4521098/","name":"Agnieszka Zulewska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3949598/","name":"Tomasz Schuchardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0826611/","name":"Danuta Stenka"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502289/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0391378/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5025978/","name":"Katarzyna Sarnowska"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Wojna państwa Rose
The War of the Roses
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2014-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":""We're here tonight because a psychomagnotheric slime flow of immense proportions is building up beneath the city."","reviewBody":"Tedious retread sequel never reaches the heights of the first Ghosbusters. It just feels like the guys got back together to goof off and get paid for it. Bill Murray seems alternately amused and bored throughout the film. The rest go through the motions. As for new faces, Peter MacNicol is extremely annoying, basically playing the role Rick Moranis played last time. Moranis actually reprises his role but has nothing to do and is shoehorned into things with irritating results. It's not a bad movie. It's enjoyable enough due to the likability of their stars but the story is weak and there's nothing memorable about the whole thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La Fiesta Silenciosa
Cicha impreza
La Fiesta Silenciosa
programme.desc: La Fiesta Silenciosa: Directed by Diego Fried, Federico Finkielstain. With Lautaro Bettoni, Esteban Bigliardi, Gastón Cocchiarale, Gerardo Romano. The day before their wedding party, a couple arrives at the country house to finalize the preparations for the celebration." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11160900/","name":"La Fiesta Silenciosa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM5NWM1YzItNTY1Ni00ZjJmLTg0ZTUtYWMwYWEwN2ZkYmUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTUyMDE2MjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The day before their wedding party, a couple arrives at the country house to finalize the preparations for the celebration.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11160900/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markstolaroff"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terrific, Different Thriller","reviewBody":"This is one of the few Argentinian films I've ever seen, so I can't compare it to what else they're doing over there, but in every way, it's an excellent independent thriller. I say "independent" because this film isn't just interested in delivering the genre goods (which it does well, BTW). It's a film that has something to say, a film that makes you think. I won't go into what I think the filmmakers or saying, or try to explain what I felt--I don't want to give anything away. But I will say that what sets it apart from a run-of-the-mill thriller is the character ambiguity. Everyone in this film is flawed to some degree, and so the characters are much richer and authentic as a result. Some people like their thrillers straight up, black & white, and so for them, this might not work as well. But if you like smart movies, shot with style, well-crafted, extremely well acted, AND delivering genre thrills, this is the movie for you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":348,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-10","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8306987/","name":"Lautaro Bettoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2013399/","name":"Esteban Bigliardi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7506705/","name":"Gastón Cocchiarale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1402126/","name":"Diego Fried"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1006992/","name":"Federico Finkielstain"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0429022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0518990/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1402126/","name":"Diego Fried"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1178554/","name":"Nicolas Gueilburt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4407602/","name":"Luz Orlando Brennan"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nuestras madres
Nasze matki
Nuestras madres
programme.desc:
Nuestras madres: Directed by Cesar Diaz. With Armando Espitia, Emma Dib, Aurelia Caal, Julio Serrano Echeverría. Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9206516/","name":"Nuestras madres","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk3NDI3MmItYzVmMy00MTFiLThkMGMtNDlkN2M4OGI3NDQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM2NTg3Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ernesto is a young anthropologist in Guatemala. One day, while hearing the account of an old woman, he thinks he has found a lead that might guide him to his father, a "guerrillero" who went missing during the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9206516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vesperview"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"For a movie titled Nuestras Madres, the mothers aren't really at the helm of it","reviewBody":"I had high expectations for this movie as it generated a lot of buzz for winning the Caméra d'Or at Cannes, however, upon watching the movie you slowly realize that this film is not really about the indigenous mothers who fell victim to the Guatemalan armed conflict, but rather about a young man who works as an anthropologist that has a personal stake for helping these women who are searching for the remains of their loved ones. He really only helps them because he is looking for the remains of his father, all while his own mother tries to deter him from searching for his father as she's keeping a secret from him.

The film is beautifully shot, there is a sequence where the the women are photographed while providing their testimonies which is beautiful, but as I stated previously, the film fails to amplify the voices that give it its title and it failed to do so because it was told through the wrong point of view. It reminds me a little bit of The Help and how Skeeter, a white woman, is the protagonist in a story about black maids suffering from racism. Here you have Ernesto, a male looking for his father's remains, taking center stage in what should be a story about the suffering of these women.

"Mi Padre" would've been a more appropriate title.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-16","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [English SUB]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi578141721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmUxOTQwOWQtNGExMy00YTM0LTg2ZjAtNTFjOWQ0ODQzYjE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5638007/","name":"Armando Espitia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1756304/","name":"Emma Dib"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11343355/","name":"Aurelia Caal"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025947/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0301560/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0511943/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3969062/","name":"Cesar Diaz"}],"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Eternal Beauty
Wieczna piękność
Eternal Beauty
programme.desc: Eternal Beauty: Directed by Craig Roberts. With Sally Hawkins, Morfydd Clark, Robert Pugh, Natalie O'Neill. After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5362940/","name":"Eternal Beauty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWE3ZmZhOTctOTU5Ny00MTM0LWFkZjctYjc0OWI1ZjM3MzQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Jane falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5362940/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"steveo122"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"excruciating","reviewBody":"I curse the sadistic bstrds who conned me into watching what I rigorously avoid seeing by casting Sally Hawkins. My first thought was about the appropriateness of a mentally unbalanced protagonist these days. But it's SallyfckngHawkins and she gives an exquisite performance of palpable human turmoil that causes emotional empathy - they might as well have filmed a wounded baby bird struggling to stumble its way across a busy sidewalk toward unseen cats - excruciating. Everyone is very good, even the vile ones...the plot, script and direction are noticeably stylized and always interesting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1618,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"psychiatric hospital,three sisters,overbearing mother,hearing voices,psychosis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1868414489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVjYjhhM2MtYjc0NC00N2UzLTg0ZDQtYjU3MzE0NjIzYTY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmVjYjhhM2MtYjc0NC00N2UzLTg0ZDQtYjU3MzE0NjIzYTY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Jane (Sally Hawkins) falls into a state of despair over her schizophrenia, she encounters new sources of love and life with surprising results."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1020089/","name":"Sally Hawkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6077056/","name":"Morfydd Clark"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700059/","name":"Robert Pugh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064292/","name":"Craig Roberts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0670857/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1064292/","name":"Craig Roberts"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chemia
Chemia
programme.desc:
Chemia: Directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. With Agnieszka Zulewska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Danuta Stenka, Eryk Lubos. Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. Accidentally he meets a beautiful, magnetic and mouthy Lena. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration grows when Lena not only understands his suicidal preoccupation but shares a similar one. They embark on a crazy journey during which Benek realizes he is not the only man in Lena's life - in addition, the girl has cancer, and she is not attempting to treat it. Admiration mixes with fear - finally Benek promises to accompany her to the end..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4088848/","name":"Chemia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTdhMGVhM2QtNDcyNC00NWI5LThmNjUtMzQ1OGU4OWE5MDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Thirty year old Benek experiences a crisis mainly manifested by compulsive suicidal thoughts and dreams about death. Accidentally he meets a beautiful, magnetic and mouthy Lena. He is dazzled from the first moment and his admiration ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4088848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125"},"dateCreated":"2015-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cancer vs. suicide--not a happy film","reviewBody":"The Polish film Chemia was shown in the U.S. with the title Chemo (2015). It was co-written and directed by Bartosz Prokopowicz. The film stars Agnieszka Zulewska as Lena, a woman with breast cancer, and Tomasz Schuchardt as Benek, a physically healthy man obsessed with his own suicide.

When the two people met, the chemistry--while admittedly strange--is powerful. The rest of the film follows Lena and Benek as they interact with the world, with each other, and with the disease and suicide.

Agnieszka Zulewska must be the most beautiful woman in Poland. It's clear that director Prokopowicz can't take his eyes--or the camera-- off her. It unbalances the film a little, but it's truly amazing to see a skilled actor totally dominate a movie.

We saw this film at the excellent Little Theatre in Rochester, NY, as part of the High Falls Film Festival. HFFF is "Celebrating Women in Film." Since the director is a man, this film surely was chosen because of Agnieszka Zulewska's star performance. It will work well on a small screen. Try to find it and watch it--it's worth seeking out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":371,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-02","keywords":"cancer,chemo","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4521098/","name":"Agnieszka Zulewska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3949598/","name":"Tomasz Schuchardt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0826611/","name":"Danuta Stenka"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502289/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484652/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0391378/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698616/","name":"Bartosz Prokopowicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5025978/","name":"Katarzyna Sarnowska"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fighting with My Family
Na ringu z rodziną
Fighting with My Family
programme.desc:
Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Rating 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":75584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"brother sister relationship,jock strap on head,wrestling,based on true story,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="
